author: Jane Dalton, Jane Dalton
title: Coronavirus: Indian street traders 'risking human health by slaughtering goats, lambs and chickens in squalid conditions'
description: Exclusive: 'Wet markets are filthy, nightmarish places and a major threat to human health'
content:
Street traders in India as well as southeast Asia are risking starting dangerous diseases like coronavirus by keeping animals for consumption in squalid conditions, an investigation has found.
Goats, lambs and chickens are sold from cramped cages in scenes m… [+3754 chars]
